name: Borderlands 2
notes:
Rename Boderlands2.exe to Launcher.exe

Don't set physx to high or you may experience crashing
content:
game:
  appid: 49520
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    arch: win64
    description: Installing dependencies
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
winesteam:
  dx9k: true
